title: Client won't launch at all when i'm at University but my friends don't have that issue
body:
So when I open the client, the "league of legends" icon opens up but then goes away instead of opening the client to update patches and press play when it's finished. 

thanks for the help!

- Chronic Virgin

replies.body: When the patcher launches, your OS needs to allow it to open.  You may have a security setting that's preventing it from launching.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow access and get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
